name: Absolute Regression
author: Jang Yunghoon/ JP
content: &quotPlease send me back to the past.&quot If he cannot not kill that person in this era, he just needs to go back to the past. The man used the &quotGreat Regression Technique&quot to cross time, going back to the past he desired so much. The &quotUnrivaled Swordsman&quot who had lost everything, his family, friends, and life. This is his first step to taking his revenge.
